definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The finite element analysis (FEA) and the variable density methods were used. The optimization method and process were presented.
sentences.chinese: 採用有限元法與變密度法，給出了優化方法和步驟。

sentences.english: Analysis is made on wave propagation in soils under high speed train loads by two-dimensional finite element method.
sentences.chinese: 基於有限元法分析了地鐵運行引起的土的波動特性。

sentences.english: The Transfer Matrix Method (TMM) and the Finite Element Method (FEM) are two ordinary calculating methods for rotary system.
sentences.chinese: 傳遞矩陣法和有限元法是轉子動力學分析的常用方法。

sentences.english: In this paper the finite element method is applied to analyze the web stress state of WCW I beam when it is straightened.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用有限元法分析了矯直時腹板的應力狀態。

sentences.english: The up-to-date research progress of the finite element analysis of soil cutting is reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了用有限元法分析土壤切削問題的研究進展情況。

sentences.english: The eigenvalue problem with the effective-mass approximation is solved by means of the finite-element method.
sentences.chinese: 用有限元法解出有效質量近似的特徵值問題。

sentences.english: The dynamic strength of BTTM hull is studied with finite element method.
sentences.chinese: 本文用有限元法研究機耕船船體的動態強度問題。

sentences.english: Slice method and finite element method are principal methods of soil slope stability analysis.
sentences.chinese: 條分法和有限元法是土質邊坡穩定分析的主要方法。

sentences.english: Up to now, the research of stochastic finite element is mature basically.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，隨機有限元法的研究已基本成熟。

sentences.english: The rolling process of medium plate was analyzed with the explicit dynamic finite element method.
sentences.chinese: 採用動態顯式有限元法對中厚板軋製過程進行了分析。

sentences.english: This paper studies the calculation of vortex-induced responses of bridges by finite element models.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究用有限元法計算橋樑渦激振動的時程響應。

sentences.english: However, there are no contributions by HT FEM for contact problems.
sentences.chinese: 然而，將這種有限元法應用於接觸問題尚無先例。

sentences.english: The magnetic hysteresis loops are simulated by micromagnetism finite element method.
sentences.chinese: 利用微磁學的有限元法，模擬計算了樣品的磁滯回線。

sentences.english: It compares the rigid limit equilibrium method with the finite element method.
sentences.chinese: 比較了有限元法和剛體極限平衡法的優缺點。

sentences.english: The rectangular groove guide (RGG) is analyzed by the finite element method (FEM).
sentences.chinese: 本文用有限元法分析了矩形槽波導。

sentences.english: The iterative formulas of elastoplastic stochastic finite element method under cyclic loading were deduced.
sentences.chinese: 推導了交變載荷下彈塑性隨機有限元法迭代格式。

definition: mechanics of a continuous medium/fluid mechanics
pinyin: lian2 xu4 jie4 zhi4 li4 xue2
